forum.content:
This website "Breaking News English" offers you the news articles for free.
These news articles are posted once 2 days and they are based on current news stories.
You can not only read it online but also download it in PDF format.
This website is really great even though it doesn't look very good outside.

Hope you enjoy it

urls.description: English News Lessons in 7 levels with graded multi-level listening and variable scrolled-reading, an
urls.title: Breaking News English - Easier News Lessons

forum.title: 【Sharing】Breaking News English
